blocks.title: How to use this handbook?
blocks.content:
This handbook is designed for **self-learning**, you can:
- Use it as post-class material for step-by-step practice
- Or even if you missed the course, use it to catch up

The core principle is: **learn and apply immediately**. You will learn how to combine AI tools with proper development workflows to practically build your own projects.
